column5: Enjoy the amazing hill country scenery on Lake Travis. Waterfront dining and golfing on Willie's cutt n putt course just a 5 min drive. Or stay at home to grill, swim, enjoy the view from the hot tub, or rent a boat/jet ski 1 mile down the road at Briarcliff Marina. Condo comes with a boat slip, swimming pool, and jacuzzi.
